TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapBodyBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: 表示添加到 或 的扩展性元素。

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to an or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定消息，抽象类型定义或具体架构定义中传输的 SOAP 正文元素的显示方式。This class specifies how messages, either abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions, appear within the SOAP body element of the transmission. 有关指定的 XML Web 服务协议的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapoperationbinding.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapoperationbinding.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapoperationbinding.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含由空格分隔的 URI 的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing a list of space-delimited URIs.

summary.span: 这些 URI 表示用来对 SOAP 体中的消息进行编码的编码样式。

span.span: The URIs represent the encoding style (or styles) to be used to encode messages within the SOAP body.

value.span: 包含 URI 列表的字符串。

span.span: A string containing a list of URIs.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才应设置此属性的值的值属性是`Encoded`。The value of this property should be set only if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否则将忽略此属性的值。Otherwise this property value will be ignored. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 URI，该 URI 表示 属性未具体定义的内容编码规范的位置。

span.span: Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specifications for encoding of content not specifically defined by the property.

value.span: 包含一个 URI 的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将返回空字符串 ("") 如果尚未设置的属性值。This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set. 如果应仅设置的值的值属性是`Encoded`。The value should only be set if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否则属性值将被忽略，因此导致意外行为，由 XML Web 服务。Otherwise the property value will be ignored, thus leading to unexpected behavior by the XML Web service. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Parts { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输的消息的哪些部分出现在该传输的 SOAP 体部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 包含适当消息部分的名称的字符串数组。

span.span: A string array containing the names of the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输的消息的某些部分可以出现在 SOAP 主体，例如，当 SOAP 与以外的某些部分。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在这种情况下的其他成员属性确定消息的其他部分的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of the other parts of the message. 此属性返回与相同的信息属性，但结果返回数组中而不是在用空格分隔的字符串。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within an array rather than within a space-delimited string. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CPP/soapbodybinding_parts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CS/soapbodybinding_parts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/VB/soapbodybinding_parts.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PartsString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输的消息的哪些部分出现在该传输的 SOAP 体部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 包含适当消息部分的由空格分隔的字符串。

span.span: A space-delimited string containing the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输的消息的某些部分可以出现在 SOAP 主体，例如，当 SOAP 与以外的某些部分。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在这种情况下的其他成员属性确定消息的其他部分的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of other parts of the message. 此属性返回与相同的信息属性，但结果返回用空格分隔的字符串内而不是数组中。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within a space-delimited string rather than within an array. PartsString 可供内部用于 xml 序列化，而且不应直接调用。PartsString is used internally for xml serialization and shouldn't be called directly. 若要返回传输的 SOAP 正文部分内出现的传输的消息部分，使用属性。To return the transmitted message parts appearing within the SOAP body portion of the transmission, use the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CPP/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CS/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/VB/soapfaultbinding_ctor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 指示消息部分是使用指定的编码规则进行编码还是定义消息的具体架构。

span.span: Indicates whether the message parts are encoded using specified encoding rules, or define the concrete schema of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性依赖于此属性的值。The and properties depend on the value of this property. 此属性的值时才应设置其值`Encoded`。Their values should be set only if the value of this property is `Encoded`. 否则 XML Web 服务将产生意外的行为。Otherwise the XML Web service will produce unexpected behavior. ## Examples SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9
